name: Spider Slayer
description:
Have you ever thought of Samurais and Steampunk Monsters...?

Spider Slayer is a 2D action game of a Samurai on his destined quest to defeat the spiders that threaten to attack his village! In the game, you'll eventually find out that the resort to violence is not always the best solution.

This game was made in 72h for 'MiniJam: Fate' Game Jam~ 

P.S: The game was supposed to have some cutscenes and endings depending on the amount of enemies defeated - But we didn't have quite some time to implement them, sorry for that ⬥ Programming:  GammaFoxTBG
